item.title: Tutoring at Noroff
item.description:
People with digital competence and creativity are in extraordinary high demand. Many of today’s jobs will disappear, and far too few job applicants have the knowledge and skills to cover the industry´s current and future needs. People’s skill sets need to be developed, and education is the solution.

Noroff is the premier academic institution in the Nordics for IT, both at university and vocational level. In my time there, I have seen that there were many capable teachers and students.

item.title: First job
item.description: Processing and archiving of shipment bills, correction of shipment errors, help on the conveyor belt, and general assistance at the office.
